Text: thank you soooooo much!! I've been waiting months  for a torrent to come out for the instrumental version and it finally happened! I'm downloading it right now but it's verrrry slow! guess I i'll just have to wait longer lol. THANKS!!!
THANK YOU SO MUCH. Instrumental Progressive Metal is my favorite genre. I don't even pay attention to the screaming most of the time, it's just another noise to me. Very happy to find this.

Great Torrent, 
Fantastic Quality, 
Brilliant Album with or without vocals.
Without though . . . I didn't realise the full complexity of the Guitar work before I heard it without vocals.
Also, I will be seeding for as long as I can be bothered.
